p.seg: REPORT Of The State Treasurer To The Governor OF THE State of Nebraska

TREASURERS OF NEBRASKA TERRITORIAL B. P. Rankin Term of office began March 16, 1855 William W. Wyman Term of office began November 6, 1885 Augustus Kountz Term of office began October 8, 1861 STATE Augustus Kountz From February 21, 1867, to January 1, 1869 James Sweet From January 11, 1869, to January 10, 1871 Henry A. Koenig From January 10, 1871, to January 11, 1875 J. C. McBride . From January 11, 1875, to January 9, 1879 George M. Bartlett -. From January 9, 1879, to January 4, 1883 Phelps D. Sturdevant From January 4, 1883, to January 8, 1885 Charles D. Willard From January 8, 1885, to January 3,1889 John E. Hill From January 3, 1889, to January 13, 1893 Joseph S. Bartley From January 13, 1893, to January 7, 1897 John B. Meserve From January 7, 1897, to January 3, 1901 William Stauffer From January 3, 1901, to January 8, 1903 Peter Mortenson From January 8, 1903, to January 3, 1907 Lawson G. Brian From January 3,. 1907, to January 5, 1911 Walter A. George From January 5, 1911, to January 7, 1915 George E. Hall From January 7, 1915, to January 9, 1919 Daniel B. Cropsey From January 9, 1919, to January 4, 1923 Charles D. Robinson From January 4, 1923, to January 6, 1926 OFFICE EMPLOYEES A. D. Linch Deputy Treasurer James M. Davey , .Chief Bookkeeper Helen Ochsner Appropriation Bookkeeper Margaret Robinson Bond and Securities Clerk H. H. Hendee Chief Clerk

STATE TREASURER'S REPORT July 1, 1924, to June 30, 1926 TREASURY DEPARTMENT, STATE OF NEBRASKA Lincoln, July 1, 1926. To His Excellency, Adam McMullen, The Governor of the State of Nebraska. Sir:— In compliance with the law, I have the honor to transmit herewith my report of the transactions of the Treasury Department of the State of Nebraska, from July 1, 1924, to June 30, 1926. It would appear that the department handled approximately seventy two million dollars, having received to the amount of about thirty-six million dollars and thirty-six million dollars disbursed as shown by the following detailed statement: RECEIPTS Balance on hand July 1, 1924 * 4,537,148.20 Receipts from July 1, 1924, to June 30, 1926 36,100,446.36 $40,637,594.56 DISBURSEMENTS Balance on hand June 30, 1926 $ 3,938,856.41 Disbursements, July 1, 1924, to June 30, 1926 36,698,738.15 $40,637,594.56 If as a state official I have achieved any success, I share the honor with those who have been associated with me in my office, to whom I am much indebted for their faithful and efficient services. Respectfully submitted, C. D. ROBINSON, State Treasurer.
